name: t3brightside/pagelist
description: TYPO3 CMS extension to create news, events, vacancies and products or just page lists. Demo: microtemplate.t3brightside.com

suggest.t3brightside/personnel: Contact lists with vCard support, and author records for Pagelist
suggest.t3brightside/addresses: Address lists to connect as locations to pages
suggest.t3brightside/imagelazyload: Add an option to disable laziload
